edu.sjsu.cmpe275.aop

Interface TweetStats

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TweetStatsImpl

    public interface TweetStats

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLengthOfLongestTweetAttempted() 
      java.lang.String getMostBlockedFollower() 
      java.lang.String getMostFollowedUser() 
      java.lang.String getMostProductiveUser()
      The most productive user is determined by the total length of all the messages successfully tweeted since the beginning or last reset.
      void resetStatsAndSystem()
      Reset all the four measurements.

    • Method Detail

      • resetStatsAndSystem

        void resetStatsAndSystem()
        Reset all the four measurements. For purpose of this lab, it also resets the following and blocking records as if the system is starting fresh for any purpose related to the metrics below.

      • getLengthOfLongestTweetAttempted

        int getLengthOfLongestTweetAttempted()
        Returns:
        the length of longest message a user attempted to tweet since the beginning or last reset. If no messages were successfully tweeted, return 0.

      • getMostFollowedUser

        java.lang.String getMostFollowedUser()
        Returns:
        the user who is being followed by the biggest number of different users since the beginning or last reset. If there is a tie, return the 1st of such users based on alphabetical order. If any follower has been blocked by the followee, then this follower does NOT count for this stat. If no users are followed by anybody, return null.

      • getMostProductiveUser

        java.lang.String getMostProductiveUser()
        The most productive user is determined by the total length of all the messages successfully tweeted since the beginning or last reset. If there is a tie, return the 1st of such users based on alphabetical order. If no users successfully tweeted, return null.
        Returns:
        the most productive user.

      • getMostBlockedFollower

        java.lang.String getMostBlockedFollower()
        Returns:
        the user who has been blocked by the biggest number of different users since the beginning or last reset. If there is a tie, return the 1st of such users based on alphabetical order. If no follower has been successfully blocked by anyone, return null.
